ConfigurationOption.Value: select wt.wonum, lo.description, lo.devicedescription, lo.requiredstate, lo.location, lo.assetnum, tl.tagoutid, tl.lockoutid, tl.applyseq, tl.removeseq, wt.siteid, (select ldtext from longdescription where ldownertable = 'LOCKOUT' and ldownercol = 'DEVICEDESCRIPTION' and ldkey = tl.lockoutid) ldtext from wotaglock wt left join taglock tl on wt.lockoutid = tl.lockoutid and wt.siteid = tl.siteid left join lockout lo on tl.lockoutid = lo.lockoutid and tl.siteid = lo.siteid

List.ListEntry: wt.wonum in ( select wonum from workorder where ( wonum in ( select lbl.refwo from lbl_labtrans lbl where lbl.lbl_transtype = 'PLAN' and lbl.laborcode = '${MX_LABOR_CODE}' ) ) and status in ( select value from synonymdomain where domainid = 'WOSTATUS' and maxvalue in ('APPR','INPRG') ) )
